channel.title: How can i add custom item on my private server
channel.description:
someone could tell me if i can add custom item on a pi server? and can i create my own item too? do i need a specific program to do that?
plz someone answer?

@202685 wrote:

to add items you find a folder named raw in cache i believe. if its not there, make oneâ€¦ the you donwload a model, put them in the raw folder. add the ints to itemdef.java compile and run
